definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: The town was pillaged by the invading army.
sentences.chinese: 入侵的军队将该城镇掠夺一空。

sentences.english: The cat lapped up all the milk.
The highly anticipated dates sold out almost immediately when tickets went on sale.
sentences.chinese: 当备受等候的售票日起头时，门票几乎当即发卖一空。

sentences.english: Three robbers ransacked the bank in twenty-five minutes.
sentences.chinese: 三个强盗在二十五分钟之内将银行抢劫一空。

sentences.english: Months of murderous interest payments gobbled up my savings.
sentences.chinese: 所有积蓄也被几个月下来的可怕的高额利息蚕食一空。

sentences.english: With loud cries, the wind is grubbed.
sentences.chinese: 到处是高声的叫喊，风被挖掘一空。

sentences.english: Or because ablution washes away the past?
sentences.chinese: 抑或清洗能将以前的罪过涤荡一空？

sentences.english: The enemy soldiers liberated chickens and sheep.
sentences.chinese: 敌兵将鸡和羊掳掠一空。

sentences.english: Tickets for the talk had been sold out.
sentences.chinese: 演讲会的门票已被认购一空。

sentences.english: The robbers stripped the house of all valuable articles.
sentences.chinese: 强盗们把房子里所有值钱的东西抢劫一空。

sentences.english: The new refrigerators have been spoken for.
The sharp wind that scoured the streets seemed to have cleared them of passengers, as of dust and mud.
sentences.chinese: 满街奔突的寒风象扫尘土和垃圾一般把行人扫除一空。

sentences.english: Exercise in an empty kitchen or storage area.
sentences.chinese: 在一空厨房或者储物区做一些锻炼。

sentences.english: At the time of our story, a family in his neighborhood had been robbed of almost everything they had.
sentences.chinese: 在这个故事发生时，余先生的一户邻居被抢劫一空。

sentences.english: All the easy gold has been mined already.
sentences.chinese: 可见所有易开采的黄金都已被挖掘一空。

sentences.english: Mr. Beaver's Woodchopper kits selling out in droves.
sentences.chinese: 海狸先生木偶配套用品在人群中脱销一空。

definition: to rake in (money)/to plunder/to milk people dry
to burn down/to destroy with fire/trad. also written 焚毀
to burn down/to destroy with fire
almost/nearing completion/bits and piece/of all kinds
